alert.note: Alert for Lanier; Lowndes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 9:36PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Cook, southeastern Berrien, Lanier and northern Lowndes Counties through 1030 PM EDT... At 936 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hahira, or 8 miles north of Valdosta, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lakeland, Valdosta, Hahira, Ray City, Moody Air Force Base, Meigs, Cecil, Courthouse, Barretts, New Lois, Hansell, I-75 At Exit 29, Allenville, I-75 At Exit 22 and Teeterville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
